subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] fried green equipment
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I had the same trouble for a coupel years after startfing EVP, especially 
after I started using EVPmaker, a computer would last only a couple months. 
I haven't had thiose kind of problems in quite awhile, it's like your 
energies have to adjust. I did manage to burn up all the voltage regulators 
in the newest Gel cell charger the other day though. (I run my equipment 
form batteries now, to eliminate AC hum pick up.)
Frank
